com.flir.thermalsdk.live.remote

Class Calibration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.flir.thermalsdk.live.remote.Calibration

  • public final class Calibration
extends java.lang.Object
    Camera calibration control interface.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Calibration.NucState
      Camera NUC (Non-Uniform Calibration, also known as FFC) status monitoring interface.
      static class  Calibration.ShutterState
      Camera shutter status monitoring interface.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Property<java.lang.Boolean> autoAdjust()
      Auto adjust mode.
      Command nuc()
      Process a one point NUC (Non-uniformity correction) with a black body method.
      Property<Calibration.NucState> nucInterval()
      Define NUC (Non-Uniform Calibration) interval between each automatic NUCs.
      Property<Calibration.NucState> nucState()
      Get NUC (Non-Uniform Calibration) state.
      Property<Calibration.ShutterState> shutterState()
      Get shutter state.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • nuc

        public final Command nuc()
        Process a one point NUC (Non-uniformity correction) with a black body method. Also known as FFC/Flat field correction.

      • nucState

        public final Property<Calibration.NucState> nucState()
        Get NUC (Non-Uniform Calibration) state. Also known as FFC/Flat field correction. Note: this is read-only property, thus it is not possible to set a value for it.

      • nucInterval

        public final Property<Calibration.NucState> nucInterval()
        Define NUC (Non-Uniform Calibration) interval between each automatic NUCs. Also known as FFC/Flat field correction.

      • shutterState

        public final Property<Calibration.ShutterState> shutterState()
        Get shutter state. Note: this is read-only property, thus it is not possible to set a value for it.

      • autoAdjust

        public final Property<java.lang.Boolean> autoAdjust()
        Auto adjust mode. Defines the adjust mode of the temperature scale on the live screen on the camera. Auto mode: In this mode, the camera is continuously auto-adjusted for the best image brightness and contrast. Manual mode: This mode allows manual adjustments of the temperature span and the temperature level.
